name: Mesh
headline: Automate outsourced accounting work with AI
description:
Mesh builds domain-specific AI agents to automate repetitive accounting tasks like cash reconciliation, expense wires, and inter-company transactions. Whatever tasks accounting firms are currently outsourcing abroad for reduced labor costs, we automate entirely.

At Carta, we spent 5+ years working together to automate accounting. We helped grow Carta's fund accounting business from $20M to $100M, transformed offline excel tasks into automated workflows, and increased customer satisfaction score by over 50% by creating an internal workspace for task coordination. 

Until now, the only way to scale accounting firms was to hire more employees and outsource more work. With Mesh, accountants can save time on each task, save money on hiring additional resources, and use their extra capacity to exponentially grow their business.

With a current shortage of 340,000 accountants in the US, along with the alarming statistic that 75% of certified public accountants (CPAs) will reach retirement within the next 15 years, AI has a critical role to play. And we want to be the ones to automate this $63bn outsourced accounting and finance industry.

Our AI agents work long hours, so accountants don't need to.

# Mesh helps you
## auto-reconcile transactions.
Backed by
![Y Combinator logo](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/b40f7c_28e04f7d89204c4d943887cd0bf0ef9b~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_128,h_34,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/b40f7c_28e04f7d89204c4d943887cd0bf0ef9b~mv2.png)
Automate your bookkeeping with our AI accountant.
Gain accurate, real-time visibility into your cash. 
Answer your accounting questions in real-time.
[Join waitlist](http://www.usemesh.com/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/Fe2O12uC>)
### Say goodbye to manual reconciliation.
Stop wasting hours mapping your bank transactions to the right categories. Automatically reconcile your transactions without the back and forth with your bookkeeper. Get your financial questions answered in real-time.
### Put your bookkeeping on autopilot.
#### Skip the complicated set-up
Our value prop is pretty simple. Sync your general ledger, bank accounts, and we handle the rest. No complicated data migrations, back-and-forth emails, or extra training required. Just a few clicks, and you're on your way to automated bookkeeping.
#### Understand the rationale behind each reconciliation
Our AI​ agent learns your business context, and automatically maps your imported transactions against your chart of accounts (COA) in real-time. It explains the logic behind each mapping, and then directly updates your general ledger. 
#### Get your questions answered in real-time against your data
Want to calculate your average burn rate? Want to know your top 3 spend categories? Want to calculate your customer acquisition costs? Run queries on your own curated library of financial data, and get answers to questions that would've taken days in minutes.

### The hidden costs of manual bookkeeping.
###### Lack of real-time cash visibility
Founders need access to real-time, accurate cash flow data to effectively make business decisions. But right now, it takes too much time to coordinate with outsourced bookkeepers, provide supporting data, and categorize transactions every month. 
###### Potential errors & delays
Manually reconciling hundreds or thousands of transactions at month-end introduces room for human error, and frequent delays. This risk is especially high during busy seasons, given a large volume of transactions that have to be reconciled.
## Spend less time reconciling transactions and more time growing your business.
Let us automate reconciliation so you can focus on what you do best.
